suggestions.title: You can:
suggestions.item1: Check if you're logged in with the correct account

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.subtitle: Learn about our refund process and wallet withdrawal instructions

overview.title: Refund Overview
overview.content: We're committed to providing quality service experiences for our users. If you're dissatisfied with your purchased service, you may apply for a refund according to our refund policy. Refunds will be returned to your account as wallet balance.

refundProcess.title: Refund Process
refundProcess.content: When your refund request is approved, the refund amount will be immediately returned to your account wallet balance. You can use your wallet balance to continue purchasing our services or apply for withdrawal to your cryptocurrency wallet address.

walletBalance.title: Wallet Balance Information
walletBalance.content: Wallet balance is your virtual account balance on the Kaitu platform, which can be used for: 1. Purchasing or renewing any plan; 2. Withdrawal to supported cryptocurrency wallets. Refunds to wallet are immediately available, no waiting required.

withdrawalMethods.title: Withdrawal Methods
withdrawalMethods.content: We support withdrawing wallet balance to mainstream cryptocurrency wallets. Supported cryptocurrencies include:

supportedCryptos.title: Supported Cryptocurrencies
supportedCryptos.usdt: USDT (Tether) - supports TRC20 and ERC20 networks
supportedCryptos.other: Other mainstream stablecoins and cryptocurrencies (please contact customer service for confirmation)

withdrawalProcess.title: Withdrawal Process
withdrawalProcess.step1: 1. Apply for withdrawal on the account page
withdrawalProcess.step2: 2. Select cryptocurrency type and blockchain network
withdrawalProcess.step6: 6. After approval, funds will arrive within 1-3 business days

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
importantNotes.note1: • Please ensure the wallet address and blockchain network are correct
importantNotes.note2: • Users are responsible for fund losses due to incorrect wallet addresses
importantNotes.note3: • Withdrawal fees may vary for different cryptocurrencies and networks
importantNotes.note4: • Withdrawal applications cannot be cancelled once submitted, please proceed carefully
importantNotes.note5: • First-time withdrawals may require identity verification
importantNotes.note6: • Large withdrawals may require additional security review

withdrawalFees.title: Withdrawal Fees
withdrawalFees.content: Withdrawal fees vary depending on cryptocurrency and blockchain network. Specific fees will be displayed when you apply for withdrawal. We'll try to select networks with lower fees to process your withdrawal.

processingTime.title: Processing Time
processingTime.content: Withdrawal applications will be processed within 1-3 business days. Actual arrival time depends on blockchain network confirmation speed. During peak periods or network congestion, arrival time may be extended.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Conditions
refundPolicy.content: Refund applications must meet the following conditions: service not exceeding 7 days, no excessive data usage, normal account status, etc. For specific refund conditions, please refer to the Terms of Service or contact customer service.

contact.title: Contact Customer Service
contact.content: If you have any questions about refunds or withdrawals, please contact our customer service team: support@kaitu.io
